explanation: The computation of the resulting price used '+ D[i]' which would add the discount value instead of subtracting it. The correct operation is to subtract the discount, so I changed that single line to use '- D[i]'.
fixed_code:
N, P, Q = map(int, input().split())
D = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = P
for i in range(N):
    ret = P - Q - D[i]
    ans = min(ans, ret)

print(ans)
